Class T7Range

  • java.lang.Object
    • t7.types.T7Range
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer>, VariableType

    public class T7Range
extends java.lang.Object
implements VariableType, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer>
    Represents a range (the result of a triplet).
    Author:
    kinan

               T7Integer step)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new range.
        Parameters:
        start - the start of the range.
        end - the end of the range.
        step - the step increment or decrement.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the step doesnt match start and end.
